title: Resist
description: Jessica Townsend can’t resist the allure of Damien Walker. Maybe it’s his bad boy charm and maybe she just wants to have a little fun, but Damien sounds like someone who can show her a good time.Matt Taylor is the millionaire who’s tired of everything and wants to break free of his life. He longs to find someone who can do it with him, but every woman he ever meets turns out to be shallow and interested only in his image.Jessica and Matt’s paths are about to cross, but not before something horrible happens to Jessica. Will Jessica be able to recover from it long enough to give Matt a chance?
author: Jess  Hunter
